languages.text: "Сдались же они тебе, {mf|новенький|новенькая}!" {n}Каллигос презрительно рявкает.{/n} "Ну хорошо, попробуй убедить меня, что мерзкие ксенотвари заслуживают милости Каллигоса Винтерскейла. Только помни — попытка у тебя всего одна".

traits.locale_text: "Сдались же они тебе, {mf|новенький|новенькая}!" {n}Каллигос презрительно рявкает.{/n} "Ну хорошо, попробуй убедить меня, что мерзкие ксенотвари заслуживают милости Каллигоса Винтерскейла. Только помни — попытка у тебя всего одна".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Go ahead, then. Try to convince me that the vile xenoscum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember: you only get one chance to try."
languages.original_text: "Сдались же они тебе, {mf|новенький|новенькая}!" {n}Каллигос презрительно рявкает.{/n} "Ну хорошо, попробуй убедить меня, что мерзкие ксенотвари заслуживают милости Каллигоса Винтерскейла. Только помни — попытка у тебя всего одна".

traits.locale_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Okay, do try to convince me that the vile xenos scum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember — you have only one try."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Okay, do try to convince me that the vile xenos scum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember — you have only one try."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Okay, do try to convince me that the vile xenos scum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember — you have only one try."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Okay, do try to convince me that the vile xenos scum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember — you have only one try."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Go ahead, then. Try to convince me that the vile xenoscum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember: you only get one chance to try."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Go ahead, then. Try to convince me that the vile xenoscum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember: you only get one chance to try."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «¿Tanto le importan, {mf|novato|novata}?». {n}Calligos resopla indignado.{/n} «Adelante, trate de convencerme de que esa asquerosa escoria xenos merece la misericordia de Calligos Winterscale. Pero recuerde: solo le concederé una oportunidad para intentarlo».
languages.original_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Go ahead, then. Try to convince me that the vile xenoscum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember: you only get one chance to try."

traits.locale_text: «¿Tanto le importan, {mf|novato|novata}?». {n}Calligos resopla indignado.{/n} «Está bien, trate de convencerme de que esa asquerosa escoria xenos merece la misericordia de Calligos Winterscale. Pero recuerde: solo le concederé una oportunidad».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “你就这么在乎他们吗，新来的？”{n}卡里戈斯轻蔑地怒吼道。{/n}“行吧，那就来吧。告诉卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔，说他应该怜悯那些邪恶的异形渣滓。但要记住——你只有一次机会。”
languages.original_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Go ahead, then. Try to convince me that the vile xenoscum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember: you only get one chance to try."

traits.locale_text: “你就这么在乎他们吗，新来的？”{n}卡里戈斯轻蔑地怒吼道。{/n}“行吧，你可以试着说服我，说卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔应该怜悯那些邪恶的异形渣滓。但要记住，你只有一次机会。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Vous vous souciez d'eux à ce point, novice ? {n}demande Calligos sur un ton dédaigneux.{/n} Dans ce cas, essayez de me convaincre que ces vermines xénos méritent la pitié de Calligos Winterscale, mais n'oubliez pas... vous n'avez droit qu'à un essai. »
languages.original_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Go ahead, then. Try to convince me that the vile xenoscum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember: you only get one chance to try."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous souciez d'eux à ce point, novice ? {n}demande Calligos sur un ton dédaigneux.{/n} Très bien, essayez de me convaincre que ces vermines méritent la pitié de Calligos Winterscale, mais attention... Vous n'avez droit qu'à un essai. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「そんなに彼らのことが気になるのか、新米よ？」{n}カリゴスは軽蔑するように声を荒げる。{/n}「それなら、下劣な異種族のクズどもがカリゴス・ウィンタースケールの慈悲に値すると俺を納得させてみろ。だが覚えておけ…挑戦権は1回のみだ」
languages.original_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Go ahead, then. Try to convince me that the vile xenoscum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember: you only get one chance to try."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなに彼らのことが気になるのか、新米よ？」{n}カリゴスは軽蔑するように声を荒げる。{/n}「それなら、下劣な異種族のクズどもがカリゴス・ウィンタースケールの慈悲に値すると俺を納得させてみろ。だが覚えておけ…挑戦権は1回のみだ」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Sind sie Euch denn so wichtig, neues Blut?" {n}Calligos' Stimme trieft vor Verachtung.{/n} "Nur zu. Versucht mich zu überzeugen, dass der widerwärtige Xenos-Abschaum die Gnade von Calligos Winterzunder verdient hat. Aber denkt daran, Ihr bekommt nur eine einzige Chane."
languages.original_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Go ahead, then. Try to convince me that the vile xenoscum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember: you only get one chance to try."

traits.locale_text: "Sind sie Euch denn so wichtig, neues Blut?" {n}Calligos' Stimme trieft vor Verachtung.{/n} "Gut, versucht mich zu überzeugen, dass der widerwärtige Xenos-Abschaum die Gnade von Calligos Winterzunder verdient hat. Aber denkt daran, Ihr habt nur einen Versuch."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Onları bu kadar mı önemsiyorsun taze kan?" {n}Calligos, kibirle kükrüyor.{/n} "İyi madem. Aşağılık zenoların Calligos Winterscale'in merhametini hak ettiklerine dair beni ikna etmeye çalış. Ancak tek bir şansın olduğunu unutma."
languages.original_text: "You care about them that much, new blood?" {n}Calligos bellows in disdain.{/n} "Go ahead, then. Try to convince me that the vile xenoscum deserve the mercy of Calligos Winterscale. But remember: you only get one chance to try."
